title: Nerf Azir or rylais. One has to go.

replies.body:
_Great arguments and points. **Very** convincing!_ But the thing is, Azir has a 900 range, but he can only affect two 400 range circles inside of it at most(and if you always put both soldiers down you are doing it wrong), and when he repositions the circles, they are placed right next to each other, which slightly limits the area he can control.

So, he needs some way to keep people in the circles. But Azir is weak to flanking, due to the reposition placing **all** of his soldiers in one place. Even if he could have them be in different spots regularly, he can only attack with one at a time.

http://grabilla.com/0661a-46d84d17-d8f1-43c5-897f-634d76dbfb26.png

Don't just sit there and do the same thing every time, even when it is failing you. And then complain about it.
So... No reason as to why?
Azir punishes cowards. Dont run, stand and fight! Lol no but 4real if he q's you, go in. He cant reposition soldiers for another 4-5 seconds.
